Start: Welcome to LuoDingo flashcards Bot! I'm here to help you study new words with flashcards. Use /help to see available commands.
Help:
Here are the commands you can use:

/start - Start the bot
/new_deck - Create a new deck
/add_cards - Add new cards to the deck
/my_decks - List all your decks
/my_cards - List all cards in a deck
/delete_deck - Delete a deck
/delete_card - Delete a card
/study_deck - Study a specific deck
/stats - Show your stats

DeckDeleted: The deck has been successfully deleted.
ErrorCreatingDeck: The error has occurred when trying to create a deck
ErrorDeletingDeck: The error has occurred when trying to delete the deck
